A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: It's painfully obvious that they changed the director for this one\, Rian Johnson wasn't able to create a smooth transition into his own script and ideas. Not that a smooth transition would have fixed the awkward misplaced humor (the milk scene really?) and some of the sudden personality changes (Poe and Luke).The only reason I'm giving this 1.5 stars is because the ending fight scene was fantastic and really makes me think that 9 could bring the trilogy back.
